Hallie’s life takes a sinister turn as danger seems to follow her every move, and she starts to question whether someone is out to kill her and take her child – or if it’s just her mind playing tricks.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E049

Eugenia se molesta con Yosmir cuando él menciona que Chabeto le aconseja que se busque una novia más "fácil". Victoria y Nicolás buscan a Leopoldo por el río; sólo encuentran el sombrero del hombre. Nicolás parece creer que en realidad fue Victoria quien le disparó a Leopoldo.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E050
programme.desc: Nicolás quiere seguir buscando a Leopoldo aunque Victoria está convencida de que el hombre está muerto. Hilario explica a Adelaida que si insiste en proteger a Florencia es porque se siente culpable de la muerte de Rosendo aunque no fue él quien lo mató. Jack informa a Victoria de que Nicolás pasó la noche en casa de Florencia.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E59
programme.desc: Max está demasiado dolido y no cree ya en ese amor, advirtiéndole que a partir de ahora se dedicará a odiarla, a olvidarla y que será ella la victima de su propia decisión. Ciego de ira y de dolor, grita a los presentes que se retiren pues no habrá boda.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E60
programme.desc: La vida de Camila ha dado un giro inusitado: es una persona envenenada por el odio y los deseos de venganza. Max no logra superar su resentimiento por el desprecio y la humillación que le hizo Camila. La verdadera razón por la cual no pudieron casarse, está escrita en el cuaderno que Rosa envió.

programme.title: Corazón Traicionado - S01:E79

programme.title: Super Game Boy The Series (Astro Ceria)
programme.desc: Danial dan kawan-kawannya Ayu, Bob dan Nina kembali beraksi dengan gelagat mereka yang lucu dan menarik. Berjayakah misi mereka di dalam setiap episod? Jom kita saksikannya.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Alya navigates through school as a normal student now, while Zizi sets out to find out what is Adam’s relationship with Dato Idris. Meanwhile, Puan Bariah has called Alya’s parents to school due to her recent bad behaviour. Mal ends up consoling Alya, revealing that he lost his father due to the pandemic. Zizi finally finds out that Dato Idris is Adam’s father. By the end of it, while Adam is heading home, he sees that an Upacara Pecah Tanah will commence soon.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang regroup and decide that they will do a public demonstration during the Upacara Pecah Tanah. Zizi, on the other hand, tells Adam to talk to his father about it. TerLetop suddenly posts that there’s a special exposé. Adam accuses Zizi for being the person behind the account. Zizi denies. The Upacara Pecah Tanah carries on as planned. By the end of it, the TerLetop account exposes Zizi as Dato Idris’s daughter. Dato Idris exclaims that actually, Adam is his son instead!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang is disappointed in Adam. He tries to explain himself, to no avail. Adam wants to win his friends back and asks for Zizi’s help. Meanwhile, Cikgu Aini gets into trouble with the school principal because of the public demonstration at the Upacara Pecah Tanah. Mal apologises to Cikgu Aini after he finds out that she was trying to protect him from getting expelled. By the end, Adam discovers the person behind the TerLetop account is Arif!

programme.desc: Dee bersama adik dan ibunya Amy, memulakan hidup baru di KL apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia baru untuk Dee yang penuh dengan muzik, gelak ketawa dan air mata.

programme.desc: The gang regroup and decide that they will do a public demonstration during the Upacara Pecah Tanah. Zizi, on the other hand, tells Adam to talk to his father about it. TerLetop suddenly posts that there’s a special exposé. Adam accuses Zizi for being the person behind the account. Zizi denies. The Upacara Pecah Tanah carries on as planned. By the end of it, the TerLetop account exposes Zizi as Dato Idris’s daughter. Dato Idris exclaims that actually, Adam is his son instead!

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: The gang is disappointed in Adam. He tries to explain himself, to no avail. Adam wants to win his friends back and asks for Zizi’s help. Meanwhile, Cikgu Aini gets into trouble with the school principal because of the public demonstration at the Upacara Pecah Tanah. Mal apologises to Cikgu Aini after he finds out that she was trying to protect him from getting expelled. By the end, Adam discovers the person behind the TerLetop account is Arif!

programme.title: Dee The Series
programme.desc: Dee bersama adik dan ibunya Amy, memulakan hidup baru di KL apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia baru untuk Dee yang penuh dengan muzik, gelak ketawa dan air mata.

programme.title: Strawberi Karipap
programme.desc: Nini dan Haikal iaitu adik beradik tiri menjadi bosan apabila asyik bertukar rumah, justeru mereka merancang untuk menyatukan Hairi dan Lisa iaitu penjaga sementara mereka.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: Fishes swim in the water. What a healing thing it would be to be able to look at the blue ocean every day if we can own an underwater world at home! How can one be the creator of the underwater world? Moreover, in this small ecosystem, most players are male and they even jokingly describe each other as "going underwater"; "Cute Pet Guide" takes you to appreciate the mystery of "going underwater"!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: There's excitement as the first baby giraffe to be born at Flamingoland is due at any moment. Can Dr. Matt ensure a safe delivery? And a young male rhino needs a medical MOT before he can meet some females but he just won't co-operate. Meanwhile a macaw with a twisted beak presents Matt with a bit of a challenge.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In the heart of London, Inspector Callum Isitt teams up with the police to track down four dogs, including two St Bernard types that have allegedly been beaten by their owners. One trail leads Callum to bustling Parliament Square, where it’s believed the St Bernard types are being used to get passers-by to part with their cash. Will he manage to find the dogs that he is looking for?

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Ali the elephant at Shoushan Zoo, carries the childhood memories of many children, both young and old. Although he is now 49 years old, he is still energetic under the care of the keepers. Once the new zoo is completed, the public will be able to see "Ali" again. When the caregiver helps Ali take a shower, Ali will take the opportunity to replenish his body with water; sometimes he will step on water in the pool and use his nose to enjoy the fun of playing in the water. nThere are currently only three African elephants in Taiwan. In addition to Ali, the other two are in the Taipei City Zoo. Because African elephants are endangered wild animals, their import and export are strictly controlled. If these three elephants die in the future, Taiwan may no longer see any African elephants. Shoushan Zoo vows to take good care of "Ali" so that "Ali's" heartwarming story can continue, and shoulder the mission of life education, so that everyone's visit to the Shoushan Zoo is the starting point of happy memories. In addition to Ali the elephant, Shoushan Zoo currently has two white rhinos, male "Xiqi" from the Taipei City Zoo and female "Baby" who was bred naturally in the zoo. nWhite rhino "Xiqi" was loaned to Shoushan Zoo in hope that he could successfully mate with the female white rhino "Baby" to raise the white rhino population.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: A crazy animal expert raises hundreds of pets in their workplace; the super cute characteristics and breeding secrets of pet turtles are revealed; elementary school students' favorite beetle army attacks, tailor-made insect jelly taste super delicious; and animal therapist is now on duty, "Cute Pet Guide" takes you to visit a parent-child farm and get close to various cute pets.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt and the keepers at Flamingoland come up with a cunning plan as they face the difficult task of trying to move a three and a half ton white rhino to Sweden. On a much smaller scale, an abandoned rabbit with an urgent dental problem and Matt discovers that picking up a penguin isn't as easy as it sounds.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as you've never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAP's, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. There's a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: The white cockatoo is one of the more common macaw species, but its number in the wild has gradually declined in recent years. Hand-reared white cockatoos love to be close to their owners. Their large size is one of their features. Like other large macaws, white cockatoos are really loud, but if it's a hand-reared bird raised from a young age, the situation of screaming will be much better. If you want to raise a pair of adult birds, it is ideal to keep them in an open area with good sound insulation or without neighbors. Their friendly personalities make them one of the more suitable large macaw species as pets.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In The Wirral, Inspector Anthony Joynes is called out to a shocking case where nine year old German Shepherd Reo has been left with an awful skin condition. Despite scratching so much that her face is covered in open sores she is still able to muster a wag of the tail, but will she have the strength to overcome her painful condition?

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: An orphaned badger cub puts up a fight when Dr. Matt gets him on the operating table. At Flamingoland, all's not well with a baby giraffe rejected by his mother at birth. Will he be well enough to face a reunion with mum? And back at the surgery, Matt must make a tough decision on Daisy an elderly cat.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.
